## Vergleich von Dortmund und Essen
```{r sensor_maps_do_e}
do_polygon_osm <- read_osm(do_polygon, ext = 1.05)
qtm(do_polygon_osm)+
  qtm(do_sensors, symbols.col = "red")

e_polygon_osm <- read_osm(e_polygon, ext = 1.05)
qtm(e_polygon_osm)+
  qtm(e_sensors, symbols.col = "red")
```

## Daten eines Tages

```{r day_data}
ggplot(sensor_data, aes(timestamp, P2))+
  geom_point(aes(y=P2), alpha=1/10)+
  xlab("Tageszeit")+
  ylab("Partikelgröße von 2,5 µm")+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 25, color="red")
```
